11#import <AVFoundation/AVFoundation.h>
12
13#import "RTCMacros.h"
14#import "RTCVideoFrameBuffer.h"
15
16NS_ASSUME_NONNULL_BEGIN
17
18/** RTCVideoFrameBuffer containing a CVPixelBufferRef */
19RTC_OBJC_EXPORT
20__attribute__((objc_runtime_name("WK_RTCCVPixelBuffer")))
21@interface RTCCVPixelBuffer : NSObject <RTCVideoFrameBuffer>
22
23@property(nonatomic, readonly) CVPixelBufferRef pixelBuffer;
24@property(nonatomic, readonly) int cropX;
25@property(nonatomic, readonly) int cropY;
26@property(nonatomic, readonly) int cropWidth;
27@property(nonatomic, readonly) int cropHeight;
28
29+ (NSSet<NSNumber *> *)supportedPixelFormats;
30
31- (instancetype)initWithPixelBuffer:(CVPixelBufferRef)pixelBuffer;
32- (instancetype)initWithPixelBuffer:(CVPixelBufferRef)pixelBuffer
33 adaptedWidth:(int)adaptedWidth
34 adaptedHeight:(int)adaptedHeight
35 cropWidth:(int)cropWidth
36 cropHeight:(int)cropHeight
37 cropX:(int)cropX
38 cropY:(int)cropY;
39
40- (BOOL)requiresCropping;
41- (BOOL)requiresScalingToWidth:(int)width height:(int)height;
42- (int)bufferSizeForCroppingAndScalingToWidth:(int)width height:(int)height;
43
44/** The minimum size of the |tmpBuffer| must be the number of bytes returned from the
45 * bufferSizeForCroppingAndScalingToWidth:height: method.
46 * If that size is 0, the |tmpBuffer| may be nil.
47 */
48- (BOOL)cropAndScaleTo:(CVPixelBufferRef)outputPixelBuffer
49 withTempBuffer:(nullable uint8_t *)tmpBuffer;
50
51@end
52
53NS_ASSUME_NONNULL_END
54
